Body: I am trying to deploy a project on IoT bluemix. I have created 3 devices, but the cf login command fails. It says authentication failed. I don't know what's the problem.
could you please provide more details of your problem? At a minimum please add the command you tried with the error and the version of cf you are using.

The three most likely reasons your cf login would fail (besides invalid username/password) is because:

  1. You are connected to the wrong API endpoint. Use cf api to verify that you are connected to the API endpoint you would like to authenticate against.

  2. Your organization requires the --sso flag. This uses a one-time password to login.

  3. Your API endpoint is behind a firewall, so you need to VPN into the right network.
